document.docAuthor: Belqat, Boutaïna, Adler, Peter H. & Crosskey, Roger W.
document.masterDocTitle: Faunistic and bibliographical inventory of the blackflies (Diptera: Simuliidae) of Morocco

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Faunistic and bibliographical inventory of the blackflies (Diptera: Simuliidae) of Morocco

subSubSection.paragraph:
Middle Atlas:
Grenier et al . ( 1957 : 231–232 ):
equinum equinum
, pupa recorded.
High Atlas:
Bailly-Choumara & Beaucournu-Saguez ( 1981 : 53–54 ): records.
Belqat et al . ( 2001 a
: 12 ): listed.
Belqat ( 2002 : 228, 243–245 )
: record, distribution map.
Belqat & Dakki ( 2004 : 94–109, 130 )
: record, dichotomous key, drawing (copy of original drawing).

bibRefCitation.author: Seguy
bibRefCitation.refString: Seguy, E. (1930) Contribution a l'etude des Dipteres du Maroc. Memoires de la Societe des Sciences Naturelles du Maroc, 14, 1 - 206. [The Simuliidae are on pp. 44 - 52.]

:
mediterraneum
, records.

: 12 ): record, new sites.

: 54–55 ): analysis of correspondence factors to determine ecological affinities and relations between 28 Rif species and 85 stations.

equinum mediterraneum
, records.
